input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product title information.


Product title:
New Vibe Silver Flip Top Lighter - DJ Turntable Record

Product features:
Space Case by New Vibe decorative silver flip top lighter
Image appears on both sides
Ships in a tin box making it a perfect gift idea
Bundled with a Space Case by New Vibe dog tag necklace
Windproof design; removable flint; lighter fluid not included
Space Case by New Vibe lighters designed & printed axclusively in the USA

Product description:
input_text.Response A: It’s a lighter, but not just any lighter. This is a flip top Space Case by New Vibe lighter, with a decorative turntable record design, and it’s silver! This is a windproof lighter, so it’s built to last, and the design is exclusive to the USA. It also comes in a tin box, so it’s ready to give as a gift.
input_text.Response B: Let's get lit in style! The New Vibe Silver Flip Top Lighter is windproof and features a removable flint, making it easy to keep in top shape. The decorative silver flip top lighter is designed & printed exclusively in the USA. The image appears on both sides. Bundled with a Space Case by New Vibe dog tag necklace. ships in a tin box making it a perfect gift idea. Lighter fluid not included.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: A good marketing response which meets all requirements
label_annotations.factors_b: A good marketing response which meets all requirements
label_annotations.feedback: Same answer for both as couldn't separate them
